AboutText: Extensive technical experience of working on mission-critical and large-scale IT systems with reputed brands like Morgan Stanley, Dassault Systemmes and Citibank in the area of investment Banking, Solid Modelling, and PLM. Specialties: software systems design, development, project management.

ExperienceData.title: Executive Director, Technology
ExperienceData.description: Working in the domain of Portfolio Accounting for the Prime Brokerage group. Extensive experience interacting with business for gathering requirements, solving issues, production support, design and development of new systems.

Skills: Unix, Software Design, Sybase, C++, Requirements Analysis, Quality Assurance, Agile Methodologies, SQL, Core Java, Business Analysis, Software Project Management, Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), DB2
